entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow early this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill near minus 17. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow overnight. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Wednesday 18 January 2023
